article.title: Changes in this Release
article.p: This release includes relatively minor updates to keyboard control and XML content navigation. There are now Prev / Next buttons also to provide another method to move through XPath results.

section.title: Tree-view Navigation
section.p: This release brings basic keyboard navigation to the tree-view that might be novel in a web app, but is standard in desktop applications:
Use the Up / Down cursor keys to move quickly up and down the element hierarchy shown in the tree. To expand or collapse a tree node, use the right and left buttons respectively.

There is now a 2-way binding between the Tree-view and the the Result-items table. So selecting an item/node in one, will automatically highlight the corresponding item in the other (if there is a match).

With the Tree-view, or Results table selected, pressing the Enter key or the Use button results in the Results table being updated to show details of attributes and child elements of the current element.

section.title: New Help System
section.p: This documentation system was introduced in version 1.0.4. It bring seach capabilities, a tree outline, a 'breadcrumbs' view and previous/next page buttons. It also makes the task of authoring the help a great deal easier.
